## isRenderDepthPrePassEnabled() function

Check if technique requires (and not disables) use of depth prepass.

Depth prepass is enabled if correct opacity is specified (in range `(0,1)`<!-- -->) \_and\_ not explicitly disabled by `enableDepthPrePass` option.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isRenderDepthPrePassEnabled(technique: ExtrudedPolygonTechnique, env: Env): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  technique | [ExtrudedPolygonTechnique](./harp-datasource-protocol.extrudedpolygontechnique.md) | \[\[BaseStandardTechnique\]\] instance to be checked |
|  env | [Env](./harp-datasource-protocol.env.md) | \[\[Env\]\] instance used to evaluate \[\[Expr\]\] based properties of \[\[Technique\]\] |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
